modName: Lilla - Standalone follower and preset - UNP-CBBE
summary: Lilla is a nord, she can wear light armor and can fight with a bow and 1h weapon. + RaceMenu preset and head mesh
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13741/?]SSE Version by bchick3[/url][/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88034-11-1511479068.jpg[/img]

[size=5][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12276043]Astra2000[/url] asked me if i can make a follower from her, so here she is now for you all. ;)[/size]

Standalone follower Lilla & preset

Location: Temple of the Divines - Solitude[/size]


If you want to use higher/other textures or another body mesh, please use this [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87851/?]tutorial[/url].
[color=#d8d8d8]Deutsche esp unter Miscellaneos, bitte einen der Main files überschreiben.

[/color][size=3][b]Lilla combat test video[/b][/size]

[youtube]JKp7Bqe7MCk[/youtube]

[size=3][b]Thx for the video Shatterhelm[/b][/size] :)

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88034-12-1511479068.jpg[/img]

[size=3]Body: UNP / CBBE curvy
High: 0.96
Weight: 100
Race: Nord
Levels with Player, Lev. 6 - 250
Voice Type: Female YoungEager
Combat Style: Bow / 1H (Light armor)
Spells: Healing
Perks: LightFoot, CriticalShot, Overdraw, Armsman, Bladesman & more
Clothes: Farm Clothes
Weapon: Steel sword[/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88034-13-1511479068.jpg[/img]

[size=3]CREDITS:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide, Outfit Studio and CBBE Body[/url] by Ousnius and Caliente
[/size][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu [/url]by Expired
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by HHaleyy
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825/?]Maevan2's eye brows[/url] by Maevan2
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url] by nevenbridge
Halo’s Poser by Halofarm
Aether Suit by Halofarm

[/size]
[size=3]RECOMMEND:[/size]

[size=3] [/size][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87851/?]Change Follower Assets Without
Diving Into Creation Kit Tutorial[/url][/size]
[size=3]by The Majestic Mod Squad[b]
[/b]
I hope i forgot nobody...

Tools:

Nifskope
Nifmerge
TES5Edit

enb: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]rudy enb[/url]
[/size][size=3]
thx for these great mods. :)

& thx to Skylaskyrim for the tutorial to create a follower. :)

[/size]
[size=3][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My other Mods[/url][/size]
[size=3]If you like my mod, please endorse and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/addimage/?id=88034]add some screenshots[/url].[/size][/size][/center]
